goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there are foldable object and soft object together, don't pack a foldable object into the box
goals.3: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
